caption: Base Container Activity
description: This is a base class for the container activity classes.
name: container_activity

http_method.description: The request type for remote API event. e.g. GET, POST etc.

message.description: Details about event or simply log message.

network_driver.description: Name of driver being used in event log. e.g. overlay, aufs.

sha2.description: Commit hash of image created for docker or the SHA256 hash of the container. For example: a3bf90e006b2.

status_detail.description: Details about the request, including the return type in the log.

version.description: Remote API version from remote API event for docker or docker version being used.
